appendix.title: Makefile Parameters
appendix.para: Following is a list of the parameters that can be set in the Book's Makefile.

listitem.para: For Sets this defines the Books it contains. Default: Undefined.
Brand to style output with. Default: common
brew tag for desktop rpms. Default: dist-5E-qu-candidate.
Override the system DTD catalog path (XML_CATALOG_FILES). Default: Undefined.
Controls chunking of first sections. 0 or 1. Default: 0.
Override the max section depth to chunk to. Default: 4.
Path to publican configuration and common files. Default: /usr/share/publican
Is this book confidential? Default: 0
Languages that should be included in xi:include even if the translation isn't 100%. Used in update_includes. Default: Undefined.
Use the desktop CSS. 0 or 1. Default: 0
Defaults to Book, can also be Article or Set. Default: Book
URL for top right link in html and the URL entry in the RPM spec file. Default: https://fedorahosted.org/publican
Embed the web navigation TOC in the html. 0 or 1. Default: 0.
Include a TOC at the given section level. 0..5. Default: 0
When building replace any languages in this list with the source langauge text. This allows you to work on translations without shipping incomplete translations. Default: Undefined.
Space seperated list of language locales. Default: Undefined.
Product this book is associated with. Default: Documentation
URL for top left link in html. Default: https://fedorahosted.org/publican
Display contents of remark tags in output? 0 or 1. Default: 0.
How many levels of sections should be included in the main TOC? Default: 2.
brew tag to use for web rpms. Default: docs-5E.
Use XML for the desktop package instead of the default html-single. Eats babies. Default: Undefined.
Source language of xml. Default: en-US
Use saxon for xslt. 0 or 1. Default: 1.
Test xalan for xslt. 0 or 1. Default: 0.
